00032 BrisaAbstractService::BrisaAbstractService(QObject *parent) :QObject(parent)
00033 {
00034     this->initialSeq = 0;
00035     this->nextMulticastSeq = &this->initialSeq;
00036     this->http = new QtSoapHttpTransport(this);
00037     this->major = "1";
00038     this->minor = "1";
00039 }
00040 
00041 BrisaAbstractService::BrisaAbstractService(const QString &serviceType,
00042         const QString &serviceId, const QString &scpdUrl,
00043         const QString &controlUrl, const QString &eventSubUrl,
00044         const QString &host, QObject *parent) :
00045     QObject(parent), controlUrl(controlUrl), eventSubUrl(eventSubUrl),
00046             fileAddress(), scpdUrl(scpdUrl), serviceType(serviceType),
00047             serviceId(serviceId)
00048 {
00049     this->initialSeq = 0;
00050     this->nextMulticastSeq = &this->initialSeq;
00051     this->http = new QtSoapHttpTransport(this);
00052     this->major = "1";
00053     this->minor = "1";
00054 
00055     QUrl url(host);
00056     this->host = url.host();
00057     this->port = url.port();
00058 
00059     this->http->setHost(host, port);
00060 }

00062 BrisaAbstractService::BrisaAbstractService(BrisaAbstractService &serv) :
00063     QObject(serv.parent()),
00064 
00065     stateVariableList(serv.getStateVariableList()),
00066 
00067     controlUrl(serv.getAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::ControlUrl)),
00068             eventSubUrl(serv.getAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::EventSubUrl)),
00069             fileAddress(serv.getAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::FileAddress)),
00070             scpdUrl(serv.getAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::ScpdUrl)),
00071             serviceType(serv.getAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::ServiceType)),
00072             serviceId(serv.getAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::ServiceId)),
00073 
00074             host(serv.getAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::Host)), port(
00075                     serv.getAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::Port).toInt()) {
00076     this->major = serv.getAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::Major);
00077     this->minor = serv.getAttribute(BrisaAbstractService::Minor);
00078 
00079     this->actionList = serv.getActionList();
00080     // Copy serv's actions
00081     for (QList<BrisaAction *>::iterator it = this->actionList.begin(); it
00082             != this->actionList.end(); ++it) {
00083         *it = new BrisaAction(*(*it));
00084     }
00085 }
00086 
00087 BrisaAbstractService::~BrisaAbstractService() {
00088     for (QList<BrisaAction *>::iterator i = this->actionList.begin(); i
00089             != this->actionList.end(); ++i) {
00090         delete *i;
00091     }
00092     this->actionList.clear();
00093 
00094     for (QList<BrisaStateVariable *>::iterator i =
00095             this->stateVariableList.begin(); i != this->stateVariableList.end(); ++i) {
00096         delete *i;
00097     }
00098     this->stateVariableList.clear();
00099     delete http;
00100 }

00102 void BrisaAbstractService::setAttribute(xmlTags key, const QString &value) {
00103     switch (key) {
00104     case Major:
00105         this->major = value;
00106         break;
00107     case Minor:
00108         this->minor = value;
00109         break;
00110     case FileAddress:
00111         this->fileAddress = value;
00112         break;
00113     case ServiceType:
00114         this->serviceType = value;
00115         break;
00116     case ServiceId:
00117         this->serviceId = value;
00118         break;
00119     case ScpdUrl:
00120         this->scpdUrl = value;
00121         break;
00122     case ControlUrl:
00123         this->controlUrl = value;
00124         break;
00125     case EventSubUrl:
00126         this->eventSubUrl = value;
00127         break;
00128     case Host:
00129         this->host = value;
00130         this->http->setHost(host, port);
00131         break;
00132     case Port:
00133         this->port = value.toInt();
00134         this->http->setHost(host, port);
00135         break;
00136     }
00137 }
00138 
00139 QString BrisaAbstractService::getAttribute(xmlTags key) {
00140     switch (key) {
00141     case Major:
00142         return major;
00143         break;
00144     case Minor:
00145         return minor;
00146         break;
00147     case FileAddress:
00148         return this->fileAddress;
00149         break;
00150     case ServiceType:
00151         return this->serviceType;
00152         break;
00153     case ServiceId:
00154         return this->serviceId;
00155         break;
00156     case ScpdUrl:
00157         return this->scpdUrl;
00158         break;
00159     case ControlUrl:
00160         return this->controlUrl;
00161         break;
00162     case EventSubUrl:
00163         return this->eventSubUrl;
00164         break;
00165     case Host:
00166         return this->host;
00167         break;
00168     case Port:
00169         return QString::number(this->port);
00170         break;
00171     default:
00172         return QString();
00173         break;
00174     }
00175 }
00176 
00177 void BrisaAbstractService::addAction(const QString &name) {
00178     // must not add actions named as an already added action
00179     if (this->getAction(name))
00180         return;
00181 
00182     this->addAction(new BrisaAction(name));
00183 }
00184 
00185 void BrisaAbstractService::addAction(BrisaAction *action) {
00186     // must not add actions named as an already added action
00187     if (this->getAction(action->getName()))
00188         return;
00189 
00190     this->actionList.append(action);
00191 }
00192 
00193 BrisaAction *BrisaAbstractService::getAction(const QString &name) {
00194     for (QList<BrisaAction *>::iterator i = this->actionList.begin(); i
00195             != this->actionList.end(); ++i) {
00196         if ((*i)->getName() == name)
00197             return *i;
00198     }
00199 
00200     return 0;
00201 }
00202 
00203 QList<BrisaAction *> BrisaAbstractService::getActionList() {
00204     return this->actionList;
00205 }
00206 
00207 void BrisaAbstractService::addStateVariable(BrisaStateVariable *stateVariable) {
00208     this->stateVariableList.append(stateVariable);
00209     if(stateVariable->multicastEvents()) {
00210         stateVariable->setMulticastSeq(this->nextMulticastSeq);
00211         stateVariable->setMulticastUsn(this->serviceType);
00212         stateVariable->setMulticastUdn(this->udn);
00213         stateVariable->setMulticastSvcid(this->serviceId);
00214     }
00215 }
00216 
00217 void BrisaAbstractService::addStateVariable(const QString &sendEvents,
00218         const QString &name, const QString &datatype,
00219         const QString &defaultValue, const QString &maximum,
00220         const QString &minimum, const QString &step) {
00221     BrisaStateVariable *stateVariableSwap = new BrisaStateVariable(sendEvents,
00222             name, datatype, defaultValue, maximum, minimum, step);
00223     this->addStateVariable(stateVariableSwap);
00224 }
00225 
00226 const QList<BrisaStateVariable *> BrisaAbstractService::getStateVariableList() {
00227     return this->stateVariableList;
00228 }

00230 void BrisaAbstractService::clear() {
00231     this->controlUrl.clear();
00232     this->eventSubUrl.clear();
00233     this->fileAddress.clear();
00234     this->major.clear();
00235     this->minor.clear();
00236     this->scpdUrl.clear();
00237     this->serviceType.clear();
00238     this->serviceId.clear();
00239 
00240     this->host.clear();
00241     this->port = 0;
00242 }

00244 QString BrisaAbstractService::errorCodeToString(int errorCode) {
00245         switch (errorCode) {
00246                 case UPNP_INVALID_ACTION:
00247                                 return "Invalid Action";
00248                 case UPNP_INVALID_ARGUMENTS:
00249                                 return "Invalid Arguments";
00250                 case UPNP_ACTION_FAILED:
00251                                 return "Action Failed";
00252                 case UPNP_INVALID_VALUE_ARGUMENT:
00253                                 return "Invalid Value Argument";
00254                 case UPNP_ARGUMENT_VALUE_OUT_OF_RANGE:
00255                                 return "Argument Value Out of Range";
00256                 case UPNP_OPTIONAL_ACTION_NOT_IMPLEMENTED:
00257                                 return "Optional Action not Implemented";
00258                 case UPNP_OUT_OF_MEMORY:
00259                                 return "Out of Memory";
00260                 case UPNP_HUMAN_INTERVENTION_REQUIRED:
00261                                 return "Human Intervention Required";
00262                 case UPNP_STRING_ARGUMENT_TOO_LONG:
00263                                 return "String Argument Too Long";
00264         }
00265         return "";
00266 }

00268 void BrisaAbstractService::setUdn(QString udn)
00269 {
00270     this->udn = udn;
